title: The frequent failure of CI for gpu-doc
body:
## Description
The CI for gpu-doc seems to be failing more frequent recently. As I look into the errors, they appear to be some specific place, see error message below.

### Error Message
Please see these CI errors.

It seems that there are three types of errors and these errors repeat randomly:
- wheel file cannot be downloaded
- python file existence error
- some baidu API error

https://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-gpu-doc/detail/PR-1184/2/pipeline/

https://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-gpu-doc/detail/PR-1179/4/pipeline/ 

https://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-gpu-doc/detail/PR-1180/2/pipeline/

https://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-gpu-doc/detail/PR-1180/3/pipeline/

https://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-gpu-doc/detail/PR-1180/6/pipeline/

https://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-gpu-doc/detail/PR-1180/7/pipeline/

https://ci.mxnet.io/blue/organizations/jenkins/GluonNLP-py3-master-gpu-doc/detail/PR-1180/8/pipeline/

### Steps to reproduce
(Paste the commands you ran that produced the error.)

1. It seems that these errors have no relationship with what codes I commit. So they can be reproduced randomly.
2.

1.
2.

## Environment

We recommend using our script for collecting the diagnositc information. Run the following command and paste the outputs below:
```
curl --retry 10 -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/master/tools/diagnose.py | python

# paste outputs here
```
